name: Santa Swing
description:
Christmas Day is celebrated as a major festival and public holiday in countries around the world, including many whose populations are mostly non-Christian.

The popular celebratory customs associated in various countries with Christmas have a mix of pre-Christian, Christian andsecular themes and origins. Popular modern customs of the holiday include gift giving, Christmas music and caroling, an exchange of Christmas cards, church celebrations, and the display of various Christmas decorations, including Christmas trees, Christmas lights, nativity scenes, garlands, and holly.

Like this "Christmas Swing" is also a Christmas game which is give more excitement, entertainment to user. This is a special christmas gift for users.

# Features.......

* Use help button for how to play the game.

* Double tap for jump the santa character.

* Swipe the screen to increase the speed of santa character when u need to go fast.

* You have to collect the gift box for children.

* Avoid green tree obstacles.

* Stay away from enemy Grinch.

* You have to reach your target position without fighting with Grinch.

* Your target is you have to reach the jumping santa at last position through playing the game & according your score jumping santa will be go forward.

* This game have 10 level. After each level you are getting so much excitement for playing next level.

* Easy to play this game with beautiful background & sound also.
